Fulfilment Analysis
1
Evaluated and identified key drivers of increase in shipping spend. Also, assessed 
the existing contract levers to identify negotiation opportunities
Home Décor Store

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Conducted a diagnostic on the current contract offered by the client’s shipping service provider and identified clear levers for contract negotiation
•
Assessed the existing e-commerce enabled network to identify opportunities for optimization pre and post addition of 78 e-commerce enabled stores to the 
existing network
•
Conducted a split shipment analysis coupled with profitability analysis to identify key drivers of higher shipping spends and key SKUs/categories driving it
Situation
•
Client lacked visibility into the contractual terms offered by their shipping services provider and wanted to gain a better understanding of the potential 
levers for contract negotiations as well as opportunities to optimize the shipping spend
•
Merilytics partnered with the client to evaluate opportunities to reduce their shipping spend and identify levers to control the same
Shipping Profitability Analyses for Home Décor Store
2
Impact
•
Provided visibility into the key drivers of the higher shipping spends including order fulfillment type, shipping rates charged to customers and SKU 
combinations
•
Overall, the optimization recommendations resulted in ~10% of potential savings on shipping spends by optimizing the network of stores
